channel.title: PI need simple commands
channel.description: Hello , can some one help me out? i need commands to change warrior guild tokens "8851" to coins "995" for 1 warrior guild token it will give 20k coins and command would be "change" can anyone make it?

item.title: PI need simple commands
item.dc:creator: @_Haste1 #Haste
item.description:
@_Haste1 wrote:

[quote=“Sagi, post:2, topic:369318”]here you go, but this command only allows you to exchange minimum 100 tokens:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("change")) { if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(8851,100)) c.getItems().deleteItem(8851, 100); c.getItems().addItem(995, 2000000); c.sendMessage("You exchanged 100 tokens for 2 Million Cash."); }[/quote]

Explain it a bit more mate. You can change the 100 to whatever you want (Number Wise)

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("change")) { if (c.getItems().playerHas(ItemCode,ItemAmount)) c.getItems().deleteItem(ItemCode, AmountOfItem); c.getItems().addItem(ItemCode, CashAmount); c.sendMessage(""); }

Read full topic
